entry.title: Phillip-Kemper/mcp-analytics-middleware: A lightweight TypeScript middleware for MCP SDK servers that delivers analytics. Captures request metrics, performance data, and usage patterns with minimal overhead. Features real-time monitoring, configurable data collection, and detailed reporting - all with full type safety.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript middleware for MCP SDK servers that delivers analytics. Captures request metrics, performance data, and usage patterns with minimal overhead. Features real-time monitoring, configurable data collection, and detailed reporting - all with full type safety.

entry.title: Ashkar2023/breakpointer: a lightweight React library for real-time breakpoint detection. supports custom and default tailwind breakpoints.

entry.content: Lightweight durable execution for Node.js

entry.title: Rahul9969/Wikipedia-Clone: Wikipedia Clone is a simple web app that fetches Wikipedia search results based on user input. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it uses the Wikipedia API to display relevant article links dynamically. A great project for learning API integration and real-time search functionality. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use!
entry.content: Wikipedia Clone is a simple web app that fetches Wikipedia search results based on user input. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it uses the Wikipedia API to display relevant article links dynamically. A great project for learning API integration and real-time search functionality. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use!

entry.title: arbuthnot-eth/PayPal-MCP: Serverless PayPal MCP integration on Cloudflare Workers. Handles API requests, auth, and secure payments with low latency via Cloudflare's edge. Ideal for webhooks, payment verification, and real-time transactions. Scalable, lightweight, and secure.
entry.content: Serverless PayPal MCP integration on Cloudflare Workers. Handles API requests, auth, and secure payments with low latency via Cloudflare's edge. Ideal for webhooks, payment verification, and real-time transactions. Scalable, lightweight, and secure.

entry.title: vladavoX/env-runtime-guard: EnvRuntimeGuard is a lightweight runtime environment variable validator for Node.js and frontend applications. It ensures that required environment variables are set, validates types, enforces allowed values, and masks sensitive data in logs.
entry.content: EnvRuntimeGuard is a lightweight runtime environment variable validator for Node.js and frontend applications. It ensures that required environment variables are set, validates types, enforces allowed values, and masks sensitive data in logs.
